alfredsnippet.snippet:
"It's probably not all that difficult to find a 4-year-old who can come up with more intelligent and sage comments than 70% of the reader comments in the Reader's Comment Section on an Internet site or what Joe Six-Pack has to say at your local Moe's."

- Mike Rogers, The Reader's Comment Section of Life
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Online Commentary
